column3:
Qhoterl Pasol has an appetite for destruction.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),16))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Mine splendid saltpeter in the Husk<Else/>Deliver the splendid saltpeter to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),17))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Gather splendid mugwort in the Husk<Else/>Deliver the splendid mugwort to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),18))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Catch a splendid magmatongue at Mjrl's Tears<Else/>Deliver the splendid magmatongue to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/></If></If></If>.

The workers have been experiencing all manner of difficulties of late. Worst among them are the cave-ins, which lead to cracked skulls and blocked tunnels. While we're still working on a solution to the former, we at least have a plan for the latter: explosives!
I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a smattering of saltpeter. Any you can provide will be gratefully received!
I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a smattering of mugwort. Any you can provide will be gratefully received!
I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a magmatongue. A generous serving of fruit worms on your hook, and they'll be jumping at the chance to be caught!
The Husk is the place most likely to have what we seek, though I must warn you, it's rather a long trip from here.
The Husk is the place most likely to have what we seek, though I must warn you, it's rather a long trip from here.
While they tend to move from place to place, a large number was seen at Mjrl's Tears recently. Perhaps that would be a suitable location to begin your search?
Do you have what I need to try my hand at making explosives?

Ah, yes. This is just what I was looking for. Probably. Once it's been combined with grasses, saltpeter, charcoal, sulfur, and just a tiny splash of urine─not mine, I might add─we should be ready to blast through that rubble!
To be quite frank, I've not much experience in this sort of thing, but it seems like that I can eventually perfect it through trial and error. After all, what is the worst that could happen?
